Luzbel/Windlord:

Luzbel was flying without care where he was. Suddenly he arrived to 
neutral base and he was wacthing most of the fight. "It's my turn" 
thought the dragon. He oppened his commlink in Blurning Hammer's 
frecuency "Is it a private party or everybody can join it??"

Windlord "Aerotaur, I'm looking other bot... LOOK OUT!!! we don't 
know what he will do!!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Coming!"  He ran out to the bridge and opened fire on Lambda.
> 
> ::Lambda::
>     She had backed against a wall and the shots caught her 
midsection.  She 
> flinched in pain and dropped her gun
